action.text: Motion by Senator Schumer to appeal the ruling of the Chair that amendment SA2360 is in order made in Senate.
Amendment SA 2360 ruled in order by the chair.

Ruling of the Chair that the point of order raised by Senator Thune with respect to amendment SA 2360, is that unless the Budget Committee, speaking through its chairman, asserts that the amendment causes a violation of the Budget Act, the Chair will not so hold.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 313(b)(1)(E) of the Congressional Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2360.
Amendment SA 2360 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Graham. In the nature of a substitute.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2360 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Graham.
